refnamediv.refpurpose: Invoke a module on MarkLogic Server

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The ml:invoke-module step invokes a module on a Mark Logic Server, as its name implies.
Because the results of a module invocation may not be a single, well formed XML document (for example, it could be a single atomic value), the results are wrapped in the specified wrapper element.

refsection.title: Implementation
refsection.para: To use this step you must have MarkLogic Server and the xmlcalabash1-xcc project. The jar file from that project must be in the class path in order to use this step.
